Title: The Knowledge Accumulation and Transfer in Open-Source Software (OSS) Development
Elements_risk_assessment:
The identified code lines are treated as buggy
lines and we count each buggy line as one bug
UseOF-SZZ: to identify bug fixes and bug origing
Summary:
We build and estimate regression models to assess individual developersâ€™ learning
progress (in reducing the likelihood they make a bug).
Outcome: The results have implications on project management about how to split efforts on tasks that add new codes versus tasks that debug and fix existing codes.
